about_the_game:
"Tower of the Abyss" is a strategic casual roguelike game, consisting of a story mode and an infinity mode.

Use various elements in the game and your luck to advance the story!
You can steer the battle to your advantage through manipulation.

Center of the village, World Tree

The world tree suddenly changes and monsters flock to the peaceful village.
It's your job to investigate the World Tree and find out the cause.

Resurrection of the Ancient Dragon

The legendary ancient dragon appears.
Defeat the ancient dragon to gain mystical effects.

Strategic Gameplay

You can use gold to acquire different levels of heroes, combine them into teams, and send them into battle.
Complete missions against extreme odds by strategically deploying units and using powerful skills.

Relic

Collect relics to strengthen your heroes and use strategies suited to specific combat situations.
By combining relics, you can get even more powerful effects.

Technology

Develop your strategies more efficiently through technology and differentiate your gameplay for more fun.
Select a sub-tech and use it strategically according to the situation.

Card

Use various types of strategy cards to lead an advantageous battle.

Ruins

Explore the ruins to obtain special rewards.

Various Languages ​​Support

Supports English, Korean, Japanese, Chinese, Russian, and German.

Developer's Note

We would appreciate it if you could send us your valuable feedback to the email address below!
Developer email: [dyddyddnr@naver.com] or [wowns226@gmail.com]

We regularly review the valuable opinions of our users and strive to reflect them as much as possible.
Since this is our first game, we are aware that there are many shortcomings.
However, we are doing our best to provide the best enjoyment and plan to enhance various aspects before the official release.

We look forward to receiving more diverse feedback in the future.

Thank you.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 450 GTS / Radeon HD 5750 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 460 / Radeon HD 7800 or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Explore a fantasy 2.5D roguelike game with a unique lineup of heroes and an ancient World Tree at the village's center. Discover diverse items and skills to craft your own strategies as you journey towards the depths of the abyss. Challenge the end of the abyss in this captivating fantasy world.
supported_languages: English, Korean, German, Japanese, Russian, Simplified Chinese
